title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7419.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7419.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) The Office of

Children and Family Services (OCFS) shall provide for and maintain standards of
personal hygiene for residents. (b) Consistent with the requirements of this Part, OCFS shall develop written
policies and procedures that govern resident personal hygiene. These policies
and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7419.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
